Description:
Premier Croydon pocket, boundless space
Epitomising effortless family living with a gleaming renovation at this tightly-held address adjacent to parkland, this smartly revitalised weatherboard home conveys atmospheric warmth on an expansive flat 1/4 acre plus block. Set back off the road with dual decks to capitalise on the tranquil position, the home steps inside to 3 sizeable bedrooms and 2 impeccable bathrooms, master with BIRs and bright ensuite. Serviced by the neat family bathroom with new WC. Polished floors guide you inside the sun streamed layout, leading to a huge open plan family/living/dining zone and smartly refreshed kitchen displaying new s/s appliances incl gas cooktop, dishwasher enhanced by elegant cream cabinetry plus a large WI pantry.
Sliding doors transition the indoors with the outdoors, stepping onto a superb alfresco entertaining deck with pitched roof pergola for all weather entertaining. Stepping down to an established grassed expanse fully secured for children and pets alike, with chicken coop primed for weekend breakfasts. Imagine celebrations with all the unlimited space, boasting a remote 6 car garage and rear covered area ideal for storing equipment, setting up a home gym or trailer/boat parking. The large established garden and floorplan is perfect for tradespeople and car collectors with ample storage and vehicle parking.
Families will appreciate the near proximity to shops, cafes and restaurants incl Croydon Mall, Burnt Bridge shops and Eastland Shopping Centre. Close to preschool, childcare and elite schools encompassing Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley College along with local primary schools, Ainslie Parklands Primary and Sacred Heart Primary. Surrounded by parks incl Ainslie Park, bike/walking tracks and minutes to Eastlink and the Eastern Freeway. The home has been painted with neutral tones throughout and includes original cornices. Further features; GDH, split system heating/cooling, LED lights, storage/linen cupboards, new blinds and excellent off-street parking for numerous cars or work vehicles/trailers.
